metadata.Title: CVE-2018-8050 on Ubuntu 20.04 ESM (focal) - medium
metadata.Description:
The af_get_page() function in lib/afflib_pages.cpp in AFFLIB (aka AFFLIBv3)through 3.7.16 allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service(segmentation fault) via a corrupt AFF image that triggers an unexpectedpagesize value.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-8050` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

afflib-tools - 3.7.18-3
libafflib0v5 - 3.7.18-3
Available with Ubuntu Pro: https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: afflib package in esm-apps/focal, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '3.7.18-3').
